CONSOLE WARNING: line 27: Calling Element.createShadowRoot() for an element which already hosts a shadow root is deprecated. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4668884095336448 for more details.
This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS dir=rtl inherits into shadow trees 
PASS dir=rtl applies to the distributed content 
PASS dir=rtl applies to the distributed content with multiple shadow roots 
PASS dir=rtl applies to the distributed content (multiple levels) 
PASS dir=rtl applies to the content in older shadow roots 
PASS dir=rtl applies to the re-distributed content through older shadow roots 
PASS dir=auto the first character in the shadow trees 
PASS dir=auto the first character in the distributed content 
PASS dir=auto the first character in the distributed content with multiple shadow roots 
PASS dir=auto the first character in the distributed content with multiple levels of shadow roots 
PASS dir=auto the first character in the distributed content from older shadow roots 
PASS dir=auto the first character in the re-distributed content through older shadow roots 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
